WorkItem.ClosedComment: closing for fail, read the discussions and other open issues
WorkItem.Description: Regardless of gear set or talents the trinkets in the 2.3.8 version have none of the procs modeled.  The only thing that is taken into consideration in its calculations are the base stat bonuses.

Comments.Message: I'm sorry , but I read on the latest notes and open issues warlocks were "almost entirely accurate and fully functional" aside from pets.  Trinkets and Procs are not pets so this was still an issue in regards to model that is still a work-in-progress.  The only reason I brought this up was in case this was an oversight since I was under the impression that procs were modeled through the Base not through the Module.
